sourcesContent:
Search for Flights

Search Flights

{{flights.airline}} {{flights.arrivale.place}} {{flights.arrivale.time | date:'shortTime'}} {{flights.departure.place}} {{flights.arrivale.time | date:'shortTime'}} {{flights.price}} {{flights.remingingNoOfSeats}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent { searchFlights: FlightRm[] = [ { airline: "pakistan", arrivale: { place: "karchi", time: Date.now().toString() }, departure: { place: "dubai", time: Date.now().toString() }, price: "10000", remingingNoOfSeats:12 }, { airline: "india", arrivale: { place: "mumbai", time: Date.now().toString() }, departure: { place: "karchi", time: Date.now().toString() }, price: "30000", remingingNoOfSeats: 39 }, { airline: "Emirates", arrivale: { place: "karchi", time: Date.now().toString() }, departure: { place: "dubai", time: Date.now().toString() }, price: "20000", remingingNoOfSeats: 20 } ] constructor() { } } export interface FlightRm { airline: string; arrivale: TimePlceRm; departure: TimePlceRm; price: string; remingingNoOfSeats: number; } export interface TimePlceRm { place: string; time: string; }
